title: The Böcker SERVICE-Lift
text:
Print Email Company Details 
The Böcker SERVICE-Lift is the ideal industrial lift for all permanent operations at work places difficult to access. 
Its first-class workmanship ensures maximum safety and reliability even for extremely challenging projects and adverseweather conditions. No matter if used in hot deserts or frosty and high mountains. the SERVICE-Lift easily masters any challenge. 
The lift is extremely versatile and can be individually tailored to any project without any problem. Different platform sizes allow for load capacities between 240 and 1,500kg and provide sufficient space for up to 16 persons. Powerful drive units lift the cabins with speeds of up to 60m/min to heights of up to 300m (higher upon request). 
For more information, please download this free white paper. Available Downloads
